About1.2: Marketplace where you can negotiate with the seller about the transaction and view its profile. Registered users can post their own offer and leave comments already existing.
About2.1: How to place your own offer ?
About2.2: In order for you to be able to place your own offer, you need to register on the site. After that, on the side menu, select the tab "Create offer" and fill in all the required fields.
About3.1: How to write to the seller ?
About3.2: In order for you to write to the seller, you need to register on the site. After that, go to the seller profile and click the "Write a message" button.
